page.title: 20Wepre Fun Day
page.content:
Wepre fun day is an annual event on a Sunday afternoon to end the Deeside carnival. Two of the main features are a 5 mile fun run & live radio reports. Later a pop group plays.There are a lot of charity stalls where you can find good bargains and a few gambling stalls such as raffles and tombola. There is a small fair containing an arcade, roundabouts, swinging chairs & a bouncing castle, as well as stalls where you can win a goldfish or rubber toy. There are many refreshment stands where you can relax with a soft drink. Sarah Christmas
{The area was surveyed by Blessed {Edward Morgan C.P., 3rd yr Humanities {classes at Deeside High School, {Queensferry C.P., Penarlag C.P., & St. {Ethelwold's C.P.
